item.title: New Website!
item.description: Welcome to the new Lasseigne Lab website! We have been working hard to get it up and running with the hopes that we can share whatâ€™s going on in the lab. (left to right) Tabea Soelter, Jen Fisher, and Jordan Whitlock We’ve been lucky to have built up a strong team within the lab. This summer we welcomed Sasha Thalluri and Avery Williams, two undergraduate research assistants majoring in genetics and enthusiastic to learn more about working in a lab.
